title: Full Application Deployment
description: Deploying the complete Social Poll application with all features to production
notes: Initial deployment pipeline is established with Fly.io, but currently only a placeholder page is deployed. Need to resolve issues with the Next.js standalone output deployment to get the full application running in production.
logs: Created deployment configuration files for Fly.io
Established basic deployment pipeline with a placeholder app
Encountered issues deploying the full application
Successful testing of the complete application in local environment confirms all features work as expected
